org.openlcb.implementations

Class StreamTransmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.AbstractConnection
      • org.openlcb.MessageDecoder
        • org.openlcb.implementations.StreamTransmitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection

    public class StreamTransmitter
extends MessageDecoder
    Example of sending a OpenLCB stream.

    This implementation is limited to sending from a fixed-size input array. The protocol permits continuous transmission, but this class is not intended to implement that.

    Author:
    Bob Jacobsen Copyright 2009
